name: G-MODEアーカイブス17 フライハイトクラウディア3
name_original: G-MODEアーカイブス17 フライハイトクラウディア3
description:
The thoughts reflected in the distant sky are the ties that bind a new world...
Here and now, all the mysteries will be revealed.

Cloudia, a world in the sky where floating islands dot the sky.
It seems that the peace has been preserved, but the sky is torn apart once again by the light of Arneus...
This is the final installment of the "Flyhight" trilogy, where the scenario, presentation, and hidden elements have all been increased in volume.

The familiar multi-weight battles, lineups, special skills, attributes, etc., are inherited from the battle system of "2", while　The party swapping system is much more powerful!
From a maximum of ten party members, you can freely select five to participate in battle.
You can choose from a maximum of ten party members and freely select five to participate in battle. A husband and wife party of Domora and Leila or a party of only magic characters can be realized.
Combine your character's special skills and go on an adventure with your own party!


■ About G-MODE Archives
The G-MODE Archives is a reissue project that faithfully recreates old feature phone games as they were back then.

In order to enjoy the app as it was back then, the web-connected menu, buttons, and keys have been transplanted, but some of them may not work.
For more information on the Steam version, press START button and see the "How to play" in the PAUSE menu.
